title: Mc Donald's, Ice Cube, Lakers, Khloe, Reality Update, Closing Remarks and more!
itunes:title: Mc Donald's, Ice Cube, Lakers, Khloe, Reality Update, Closing Remarks and more!
description:
A Texas child accidentally wears an X-rated shirt to school. Ice Cube has some choice words in his warning. The Lakers call up Andre Ingram from the G League and he puts on show at Staples Center. Khloe's baby daddy is caught up! Carla continues her Reality Update, this time talking about Love and Hip Hop Atlanta. Saving the best for last, The CEO goes in on the importance of accountability in his Closing Remarks and more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
